original_text: And David left the things in charge of the keeper of the baggage and ran to the ranks and went and greeted his brothers.
korean_text: 다윗이 자기의 짐을 짐 지키는 자의 손에 맡기고 군대로 달려가서 형들에게 문안하고

sentences.original_text: And David left the things in charge of the keeper of the baggage
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 다윗은 짐을 지키는 자에게 그것들을 맡겼습니다.

sentences.original_text: and went and greeted his brothers.
